info.description:
ncmpy - a [Python + Curses]-based MPD client
        ============================

        ncmpy is an MPD client based on Curses. Besides:

            basic playback control, 
            playlist/database management, 
            
        it supports:
        
            song rating, 
            auto lyrics fetching and saving, 
            lyrics highlighting and OSD, 
            searching by tags.
info.name: ncmpy
